name: Embedded Finance Widget (Referral Partners)
oneLiner: Let partners embed a pre-qual widget on their site with tracking.
pain: Allows CPAs, insurance agents, and auto dealers to embed a funding pre-qualification tool directly on their website, capturing leads with partner tracking.
logic: Minimal data capture. Submit lead to internal intake with referral tracking code. Widget matches partner branding.

name: DD+7 Impact Calculator
oneLiner: Quantifies how much working capital is trapped by longer payout cycles.
pain: Quantifies the exact dollar amount of working capital locked up by DD+7 payout delays.
logic: Cash Loss = (New Cycle - Current Cycle) * Average Daily Sales

outputs.label: Estimated Trapped Capital
outputs.note: Back-of-napkin trapped working capital from payout delay.

name: NECA Material Money Quoter
oneLiner: Instantly quotes the bridge capital needed to buy materials for a new job.
pain: Contractors need cash for materials before milestone payments hit.
logic: Recommended Advance = Estimated Material Cost (capped at 25% of job value or $50k, whichever is lower).

outputs.label: Recommended Advance
outputs.note: Apply the cap logic in underwriting; this is the base bridge amount.

name: Payroll Gap Bridge Estimator
oneLiner: Calculates how much funding is needed to make payroll when a payment is delayed.
pain: Payroll hits Friday. Client pays later. This tool tells you the gap fast.
logic: Funding Needed = Payroll - Cash Available (floor at 0).

name: MCA Repayment Estimator
oneLiner: Projects daily repayment impact so owners see the cashflow bite up front.
pain: Owners sign MCA terms without understanding daily deduction. This tool forces clarity.
logic: Total Repayment = Advance * Factor Rate. Estimated Daily Payment = Total Repayment / 90 business days.

name: The DD+7 Impact Calculator
pain: **Pain Solved:** Quantifies the exact dollar amount of working capital permanently locked up by Amazon's DD+7 (Delivery Date \+ 7 Days) policy. Solves the "Cash Trapped" anxiety.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:** Cash Loss \= (New DD+7 Cycle \- Current Payout Cycle) \* Average Daily Sales

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Average Daily Amazon Sales ($), Current Payout Cycle (Days) (e.g., 14), New DD+7 Cycle (Days) (e.g., 28). **Core Logic:** Cash Loss \= (New DD+7 Cycle \- Current Payout Cycle) \* Average Daily Sales

name: The Inventory Turnover Accelerator
pain: **Pain Solved:** Proves the financial benefit of paying the Payability fee by showing how many *extra* inventory turns are possible per year by getting daily cash. Solves the "Cost vs. Velocity" problem.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:Turns Gained (Payability)** \= Turns Lost \* 1.3 (Assumed 30% velocity gain).

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Initial Capital ($), Average Inventory Turn Time (Days). **Core Logic:** Turns Lost Waiting (14 Days) \= Initial Capital / (Average Inventory Turn Time). **Turns Gained (Payability)** \= Turns Lost \* 1.3 (Assumed 30% velocity gain).

name: The "Fee Nullifier" Cash Back Calculator
pain: **Pain Solved:** Neutralizes the biggest objection (the 2% Payability fee) by demonstrating how the 2% cash back from the Seller Card makes the effective cost of capital zero. Solves the "High Fee" objection.

name: TikTok Shop Viral Curse Predictor
pain: **Pain Solved:** Shows new TikTok Shop sellers the risk of suspension (Late Dispatch Rate) due to the 15-30 day hold on funds, validating the need for instant capital to pay suppliers. Solves the "Inventory-for-Viral-Success" crisis.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:** LDR Risk Score \= Current Cash on Hand / (Units Sold \* Supplier Cost per Unit). Status \= "Critical" if score \< 1.0.

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Units Sold in Last 48 Hours, Current Cash on Hand ($), Supplier Cost per Unit ($). **Core Logic:** LDR Risk Score \= Current Cash on Hand / (Units Sold \* Supplier Cost per Unit). Status \= "Critical" if score \< 1.0.

name: Account Level Reserve Hostage Calculator
pain: **Pain Solved:** Converts the abstract "Account Level Reserve" balance into a concrete, missed profit number. Taps into the visceral anger of having "earned money withheld." Solves the "Hostage" feeling.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:** Missed Profit \= Current Reserve Balance \* Average Net Profit Margin \* (Assumed 1 extra turn/mo).

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Current Account Level Reserve Balance ($), Average Net Profit Margin (%). **Core Logic:** Missed Profit \= Current Reserve Balance \* Average Net Profit Margin \* (Assumed 1 extra turn/mo).

name: The CPA/Bookkeeper Fee Integration Tool
pain: **Pain Solved:** Shows accountants and tax preparers how to seamlessly integrate Payability to ensure their clients can always pay *their* (the accountant's) invoice, solving the professional's "Invoice Chasing" problem.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:** Total Days of Float Eliminated \= Average Client Invoicing Delay. Outputs a checklist for integrating Payability card for vendor payments.

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Average Client Invoicing Delay (Days), Average Client Invoice Amount ($). **Core Logic:** Total Days of Float Eliminated \= Average Client Invoicing Delay. Outputs a checklist for integrating Payability card for vendor payments.

name: The Supply Chain Hostage Release Timer
oneLiner: The Supply Chain Hostage Release Timer
pain: **Pain Solved:** Calculates the revenue lost when a stockout occurs because the seller missed a supplier wire deadline. Solves the "Inventory Stockout Catastrophe" problem.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:** Missed Sales Revenue \= Units You Are Currently Out Of Stock On \* (Days Since Out of Stock \* Average Daily Unit Sales).

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Units You Are Currently Out Of Stock On, Average Daily Unit Sales, Days Since Out of Stock. **Core Logic:** Missed Sales Revenue \= Units You Are Currently Out Of Stock On \* (Days Since Out of Stock \* Average Daily Unit Sales).

name: The FBA Prep Center Payout Predictor
oneLiner: The FBA Prep Center Payout Predictor
pain: **Pain Solved:** Shows FBA Prep Centers how partnering with Payability will guarantee they get paid on time, as their client (the seller) will no longer have cash flow delays. Solves the "Accounts Receivable Chasing" problem for the prep center.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:Payout Reliability Guarantee** \= "Referrals who use Payability will pay your invoice within 24 hours of funding."

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Average Seller Invoice (Days), Invoice Delays Due to Payout Holds (Days). **Core Logic:** Simple submission form. Outputs a message: **Payout Reliability Guarantee** \= "Referrals who use Payability will pay your invoice within 24 hours of funding."

name: The "Black Box" Amazon Lending Score
pain: **Pain Solved:** Agitates the high-revenue seller by showing their inability to apply for "invite-only" Amazon Lending when they need it most, contrasting it with Payability's instant access. Solves the "Black Box Inflexibility" problem.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:Access Status** \= "LOCKED. Payability is your immediate-access alternative."

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Annual Revenue ($), Amazon Lending Invite Status (Yes/No). **Core Logic:** If "No" Invite, output **Access Status** \= "LOCKED. Payability is your immediate-access alternative."

name: The Cost of Waiting vs. Cost of Fee Analyzer
oneLiner: The Cost of Waiting vs. Cost of Fee Analyzer
pain: **Pain Solved:** Uses the "Kill Shot Data" math to prove that the cost of capital (the fee) is mathematically lower than the cost of sitting on cash flow (the waiting). Solves the "Opportunity Cost" problem.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:Net Win** \= "The 2% fee nets a win of \[Margin \- Fee\]% profit by allowing 14 extra days of sales."

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Average Margin (%), Cost of Advance Fee (%) (e.g., 2), Days Advance Saves (e.g., 14). **Core Logic:** If Margin \> Fee, output **Net Win** \= "The 2% fee nets a win of \[Margin \- Fee\]% profit by allowing 14 extra days of sales."

name: The Wholesale Distributor Payout Gap Closer
oneLiner: The Wholesale Distributor Payout Gap Closer
pain: **Pain Solved:** Quantifies the exact revenue lost by wholesale distributors who are forced to sell less profitable products (due to cash flow constraints) instead of higher-margin items. Solves the distributor's "Cash Flow Constrained Buying" problem.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:** Profit Gap \= Total Monthly Purchase Volume \* (Average Profit Margin on Desired Stock \- Average Profit Margin on Constrained Stock).

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Average Profit Margin on Constrained Stock (%), Average Profit Margin on Desired Stock (%), Total Monthly Purchase Volume ($). **Core Logic:** Profit Gap \= Total Monthly Purchase Volume \* (Average Profit Margin on Desired Stock \- Average Profit Margin on Constrained Stock).

name: The Multi-Channel Expansion Revenue Forecaster
pain: **Pain Solved:** Shows existing Amazon sellers (who are cash-starved) the quantifiable, missed revenue potential by *not* expanding to new channels (Walmart, Shopify) due to lack of capital for upfront inventory/setup. Solves the "Channel Lock-In" anxiety.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:** Missed Annual Revenue \= Current Amazon Monthly Revenue \* 12 \* Assumed Revenue Lift from Expansion.

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Current Amazon Monthly Revenue ($), Target New Channel (e.g., Walmart), Assumed Revenue Lift from Expansion (%). **Core Logic:** Missed Annual Revenue \= Current Amazon Monthly Revenue \* 12 \* Assumed Revenue Lift from Expansion.

name: The Seasonal Stock-Up Stress Reliever
pain: **Pain Solved:** Calculates how much extra capital is needed, and how far in advance, a seller must order inventory to prevent seasonal stockouts, validating the need for instant, flexible funding. Solves the "Holiday Stockout Panic."

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:** Extra Units Needed \= (Normal Daily Sales \* Peak Season Sales Multiplier \* Lead Time to Receive Inventory) \- Current Stock. Timeline shows when funding is needed based on lead time.

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Normal Daily Sales (Units), Peak Season Sales Multiplier (e.g., 3x), Lead Time to Receive Inventory (Days). **Core Logic:** Extra Units Needed \= (Normal Daily Sales \* Peak Season Sales Multiplier \* Lead Time to Receive Inventory) \- Current Stock. Timeline shows when funding is needed based on lead time.

name: The Freight Forwarder Funding Guarantee
pain: **Pain Solved:** Assures freight forwarders that their clients (sellers) will have immediate cash to cover hefty shipping and duties invoices, eliminating payment risk. Solves the freight forwarder's "High-Risk Client" problem.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:Funding Assurance** \= "Clients using Payability have cash released 14-28 days faster

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Average Freight Invoice Amount ($), Client's Average Payout Delay (Days). **Core Logic:** Simple submission form. Outputs a message: **Funding Assurance** \= "Clients using Payability have cash released 14-28 days faster, virtually eliminating invoice delay risk."

name: The Q4 Profit Erosion Forecaster
pain: **Pain Solved:** Quantifies the massive margin erosion caused by resorting to high-interest, short-term loans or desperate inventory sourcing during the critical Q4 holiday season. Solves the "Peak Season Panic Financing" problem.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:** Avoided Interest Cost \= Total Q4 Inventory Needed \\\* Interest Rate of Alternative Loan. Outputs a comparison showing the cost of Payability's advance vs. high-interest alternatives.

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Total Q4 Inventory Needed ($), Interest Rate of Alternative Loan (%). **Core Logic:** Avoided Interest Cost \= Total Q4 Inventory Needed \\\* Interest Rate of Alternative Loan. Outputs a comparison showing the cost of Payability's advance vs. high-interest alternatives.

name: The Customer Review Velocity Builder
pain: **Pain Solved:** Shows the quantifiable value of faster cash flow by calculating how many more units can be launched *sooner*, leading to a faster accumulation of critical customer reviews and better BSR (Best Seller Rank). Solves the "Slow-Start Launch" problem.

inputs.label: Input Fields:Core Logic:** Extra Reviews Gained \= Days Saved \\\* Average Daily Sales \\\* Review Conversion Rate.

logic: ** **Input Fields:** Days Saved by Daily Payouts (e.g., 14), Average Daily Sales (Units), Review Conversion Rate (%). **Core Logic:** Extra Reviews Gained \= Days Saved \\\* Average Daily Sales \\\* Review Conversion Rate.

name: The "Stockout Death Spiral" Estimator
pain: **The Problem:** Sellers underestimate the cost of being out of stock (it's not just lost sales; it's lost SEO rank).
logic: Calculates the total financial damage of a 14-day stockout.

name: The Equity-Saver Shield (VC vs. 8fig)
pain: **The Problem:** Founders think VC money is "free" because there's no interest. They're wrong.
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "Boat-to-Bank" Gap Analyzer
pain: **The Problem:** Cash is "dead" while inventory is on the water.
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The MCA "Shark" Auditor
pain: **The Problem:** Merchant Cash Advances (MCAs) hide their triple-digit APRs behind "Factor Rates."
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "Viral Hit" Stress Test
pain: **The Problem:** A TikTok video goes viral, the product sells out, and the brand dies because they can't restock fast enough.
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "Asset-Light" ROI Multiplier
pain: **The Problem:** Sellers don't know if they should buy more inventory or spend more on ads.
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "Amazon Payout" Bridge Predictor
pain: **The Problem:** Amazon’s 14-day hold kills high-velocity sellers.
logic: Calculates the gap between Amazon's disbursement schedule and the factory's "Pay-to-Play" date.

name: The Q4 "War-Room" PO Planner
pain: **The Problem:** Ordering too late for Chinese New Year or Black Friday.
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "Ghost Revenue" Interceptor
pain: **The Problem:** Knowing how much money you *didn't* make because you were out of stock.
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "Landed Cost" Profit Leak Finder
pain: **The Problem:** Sellers forget to factor in storage, shipping spikes, and duties, thinking they are more profitable than they are.
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "Exit Value" Accelerator
pain: **The Problem:** Sellers want to sell their business but their EBITDA is low due to stockouts.
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "Air Freight" Panic Button
pain: **The Problem:** Stock is low. Sea freight takes 45 days. Air freight is 5x the cost. Is it worth it?
logic: Calculates the "Profit Parity" point. Does the extra margin from staying in stock outweigh the massive shipping bill?

name: The "Big Box" Trap Simulator (Net-90 Survival)
pain: **The Problem:** Walmart or Target finally placed a PO. Huge win? No. They pay Net-90. You go bankrupt fulfilling the order.
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "Zombie SKU" Hunter
pain: **The Problem:** 80% of cash is tied up in the 20% of products that don't sell.
logic: Calculates "Capital Velocity" per SKU. Any SKU with \>6 months supply and \<10% margin contribution is marked "Zombie."

name: The "Ad Cost" Inflation Forecaster
pain: **The Problem:** CPAs (Cost Per Acquisition) rise every Q4. Sellers budget based on July costs, not November costs.
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "Golden Quarter" Bonus Calculator
pain: **The Problem:** Founders pay themselves last. They want to know, "If I hit $1M this Q4, what do *I* get?"
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "Supplier Bully" Power Meter
pain: **The Problem:** Suppliers dictate terms (30% deposit, 70% before ship) because the seller is small.
logic: Calculates the volume needed to demand Net-30 terms from a Chinese factory.

name: The "Discount" Death Spiral Check
pain: **The Problem:** Running a 25% OFF sale to drive cash flow, but destroying unit economics.
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The Amazon "Fees & Fines" Auditor (Estimate)
pain: **The Problem:** FBA fees, storage fees, and "low inventory" fees eat margins silently.
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "Subscription Box" Churn Burner
pain: **The Problem:** Sub boxes must buy goods *before* renewals process. High churn \= leftover junk.
logic: Calculates the risk of over-ordering based on Churn Rate volatility.

name: The "Influencer" Break-Even Calculator
pain: **The Problem:** Paying an influencer $5,000 upfront. How many units *actually* need to move?
logic: User inputs → calculation/logic → shareable artifact + CTA.

name: The "3PL" Switching Cost Calculator
pain: **The Problem:** Everyone hates their 3PL, but fears the cost of moving stock.
logic: Calculates the ROI of moving to a cheaper 3PL vs. the one-time move cost.

name: Cash Flow Gap Bridge Calculator
pain: **Problem Solved:** Finds the minimum Merchant Cash Advance (MCA) amount needed to cover an immediate payroll or invoice gap in under 60 seconds.

name: Fix-and-Flip ROI & Max Loan Estimator
pain: **Problem Solved:** Calculates the maximum Hard Money Loan amount a property can qualify for and the potential Return on Investment (ROI).

name: Startup Funding Eligibility Quiz
pain: **Problem Solved:** Immediately pre-qualifies a new business (0 months in biz) for a Personal/Startup Loan.

name: Bank-Rejected" Second Look Finder
pain: **Problem Solved:** Identifies a viable alternative funding product after a traditional bank denial.

name: Real Estate Proof of Funds (POF) Generator
oneLiner: Real Estate Proof of Funds (POF) Generator
pain: **Problem Solved:** Instantly generates a generic, conditional Proof of Funds letter required for making real estate offers.

name: SBA Denial Pivot Tool
pain: **Problem Solved:** Provides immediate, faster funding options for businesses that cannot wait the 1-3 months for an SBA 7(a) loan.

name: Bad Credit Business Funding Match
pain: **Problem Solved:** Matches businesses with lower FICO scores to the GoKapital product with the lowest minimum requirement.

name: Equipment Payment Estimator
pain: **Problem Solved:** Estimates the monthly payment and total cost for financing a new piece of business equipment.

name: Lender-Readiness Score
pain: **Problem Solved:** Assesses a lead's current profile against the full underwriting criteria for all GoKapital products.

name: Competitor Rejection Analyzer
pain: **Problem Solved:** Converts a rejection from a monoline competitor (e.g., OnDeck, BlueVine) into a viable GoKapital opportunity.

name: Invoice-to-Cash Flow Gap Analyzer
pain: **Problem Solved:** Calculates exactly how many days a contractor or service business can survive before their next payment arrives.

name: Gig Worker "Back on the Road" Calculator
oneLiner: Gig Worker "Back on the Road" Calculator
pain: **Problem Solved:** Shows Uber/Lyft/DoorDash drivers exactly how much income they're losing per day their car is in the shop.

name: Tax Payment Advance Estimator
pain: **Problem Solved:** Helps business owners (especially Schedule C gig workers) calculate their estimated quarterly tax bill and funding needed.

name: Material Cost Inflation Tracker (For Contractors)
pain: **Problem Solved:** Shows contractors how much more capital they need today vs. 6 months ago due to supply price increases.

name: Premium Finance "Double Commission" Calculator (For Insurance Agents)
oneLiner: Premium Finance "Double Commission" Calculator (For Insurance Agents)
pain: **Problem Solved:** Shows commercial insurance agents exactly how much extra income they can earn by financing their client's premiums.

name: Meet or Beat" Rate Comparison Tool
oneLiner: Meet or Beat" Rate Comparison Tool
pain: **Problem Solved:** Allows borrowers to input their current MCA or loan terms and see if GoKapital can beat it (automated pre-qualification).

name: Equipment ROI & Payment Calculator
pain: **Problem Solved:** Shows businesses whether buying new equipment will actually increase revenue enough to cover the financing payment.

name: Restaurant "Walk-In Emergency" Funding Tool
pain: **Problem Solved:** Instant estimate for emergency equipment financing when critical kitchen equipment fails.

name: Embedded Finance Widget (For Referral Partners)
pain: **Problem Solved:** Allows CPAs, Insurance Agents, and Auto Dealers to embed a funding pre-qualification tool directly on their own website.

name: Wholesaler/Real Estate "Deal Analyzer" Pro
pain: **Problem Solved:** Comprehensive property analysis tool that calculates maximum offer, rehab budget, ARV, AND generates conditional Proof of Funds letter.

name: Turndown Retrieval" Lead Magnet Template
pain: **Problem Solved:** Provides referral partners (bank loan officers, equipment leasing agents) with a ready-made PDF they can send to rejected applicants.

name: Daily Pay Commission" Calculator (Agent Recruitment Tool)
oneLiner: Daily Pay Commission" Calculator (Agent Recruitment Tool)
pain: **Problem Solved:** Shows potential agents exactly how much they could earn daily vs. traditional affiliate programs that pay monthly.

name: Supply House Partnership Landing Page Template
oneLiner: Supply House Partnership Landing Page Template
pain: **Problem Solved:** Provides agents with a pre-built, conversion-optimized landing page to pitch supply house partnerships.

name: Credit Incubator" Roadmap Generator
pain: **Problem Solved:** Creates a personalized 60-90 day action plan for businesses that don't currently qualify for any GoKapital product.

name: The Premium Finance Gap Calculator
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Instantly calculates the exact financing needed to cover a commercial insurance premium down payment, saving the "Turndown Tim" agent from losing a renewal.

name: The Urgent Tax Advance Estimator
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Gives "Tax Prep Tammy’s" clients (and gig workers) an immediate estimate of a tax payment advance, preventing IRS penalties.

name: The Gig Income Funding Predictor ("Giggle Finance")
oneLiner: The Gig Income Funding Predictor ("Giggle Finance")
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Allows a gig worker ("Networker Nate’s" audience) to see their funding potential instantly without a hard credit pull.

name: The NECA Material Money Quoter
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Solves the contractor's "Cash Flow Gap" by immediately calculating the bridge capital needed to buy materials for a new job.

name: The "Turndown Retrieval" Script Generator
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Generates a ready-to-use script for agents to approach bank loan officers for rejected leads ("trash"), enabling the "Zero Budget Tactic."

name: The Blue Collar Banker Lead Qualifier
oneLiner: The Blue Collar Banker Lead Qualifier
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Helps agents pre-qualify a prospect against DAC/Bank Breezy's *actual* underwriting minimums, reducing wasted effort on non-fundable leads.

name: The Daily Commission Projection Dashboard
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Provides new agents with a quick, motivational calculation of their daily earning potential based on the "Daily Pay" value proposition.

name: The Auto-Repair Emergency Advance Tool
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Directly targets the gig worker's biggest fear: a broken car and no cash for repairs, which equals no income.

name: The Merchant Cash Advance (MCA) Repayment Estimator
oneLiner: The Merchant Cash Advance (MCA) Repayment Estimator
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Helps Main Street retail owners (salons, restaurants) understand their future cash flow by projecting the daily deduction for an MCA.

name: The Competitor "Meet or Beat" Submitter
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Weaponizes the $500 guarantee to instantly build trust and overcome client skepticism by offering a risk-free application.

name: The Referral Commission Payout Estimator
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** New agents want to quickly know how much they can earn from a potential deal. This tool provides an immediate, transparent commission calculation, reinforcing the "Daily Pay" value proposition.

name: The Buy-Here-Pay-Here Down Payment Bridge
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Helps the F\&I manager at a BHPH dealership instantly determine the short-term funding needed for a customer to complete a car purchase, converting a "no-sale" to a "double-dip" commission.

name: The Trade Association Profit-Split Calculator
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Demonstrates to a Trade Association President (like PHCC or ABC) the non-dues revenue stream possible by becoming a DAC Master Affiliate.

name: The Credit Score vs. Cash Flow Analyzer
oneLiner: The Credit Score vs. Cash Flow Analyzer
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Educates the sub-prime micro-entrepreneur that their low credit score is not a death sentence for funding, highlighting Bank Breezy’s revenue-based underwriting model.

name: The Cold Lead Monetization Calculator
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Shows bank loan officers or equipment leasing agents the exact dollar amount of commission they are throwing away by not monetizing their rejected leads.

name: The Payroll Bridge Funding Quoter
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Addresses the "Survival" motivation: the need for funds to meet payroll when client payments (Net-30/60) are delayed.

name: The Trucker Repair-to-Revenue Tracker
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Independent truckers need quick capital for expensive repairs. This tool shows how quickly the advance is covered by their subsequent revenue.

name: The Passive Income Network Builder
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Converts an interested agent into a recruiter by showing the exponential power of building a downline, targeting the "Networker Nate" persona.

name: The "Bank Firing" Risk Score
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Uses tightening banking standards data to agitate small business owners about their risk of being rejected by their current bank, making them receptive to an alternative solution.

name: The Equipment Leasing Deposit Calculator
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Assists equipment leasing brokers in retaining deals when a customer (like a contractor) can't afford the large, initial security deposit or first month's payment.

name: The Same-Day vs. 60-Day Cost Analyzer
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Justifies the higher cost of "speed capital" by quantifying the revenue lost waiting for a traditional bank loan (30-60 days).

name: The Tax Prep Fee Advance Solution
oneLiner: The Tax Prep Fee Advance Solution
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Helps "Tax Prep Tammy" secure her own fee upfront, as clients often need cash for both the tax bill *and* her service.

name: The "Bad Credit, Good Business" Certifier
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Provides a psychological boost and clear validation for the sub-prime entrepreneur who feels penalized by a low credit score but runs a profitable business.

name: The Service Industry Tip-to-Revenue Translator
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** For salons, restaurants, and bars, this tool quantifies the credit card tip flow to show bankability, proving steady revenue beyond standard sales.

name: The NECA Endorsement Value Illustrator
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Converts the abstract concept of a trade endorsement into a tangible trust metric for skeptical contractors.

name: The Competitor Rate-to-Factor Rate Translator
pain: **Pain Point Solved (Under 60 Sec):** Demystifies the difference between traditional APR and the Factor Rate used in Merchant Cash Advances, allowing the agent to transparently compare offers.

name: Bezos Interest Calculator
oneLiner: Quantify the profit you lose while Amazon holds your payout float.
pain: Visualizes the opportunity cost of Amazon holding payout funds for ~14 days.
logic: (Payout Amount) * (ROI%/100) * (26 pay periods / 12 months).

outputs.label: Estimated Monthly Lost Profit
outputs.note: Doc formula interpreted as monthly-equivalent profit opportunity.

name: Stockout Bleed Auditor
oneLiner: Calculate profit lost + ranking penalty while you wait for capital.
pain: Quantifies the cost of waiting for a wire when a winner is out of stock.
logic: Direct Loss = Daily Sales * Profit * Days; Ranking Penalty = Direct Loss * 1.5.

name: Velocity Multiplier Simulator
oneLiner: Compare compounding growth with standard turns vs fast turns.
pain: Shows how faster inventory turns can change 90-day outcomes.
logic: Compares compounding over 90 days at different intervals (standard vs faster turns).

name: DD+7 Reality Calendar
oneLiner: Show the real cash timeline under Delivery Date + 7 policies.
pain: Clarifies the cashflow gap created by DD+7 timelines.
logic: Amazon Date = Ship + Delivery + 7 + 3; OnRamp Date = Ship + 0.
ctaLabel: Get paid the day you ship

name: Prep Center Shock Audit (2026 Edition)
oneLiner: Calculate the new upfront cash required for 3PL/prep fees.
pain: Quantifies the upfront cash requirement shift to pre-revenue invoices.
logic: New Monthly Cash Requirement = Monthly Units * Prep Fee.

name: Wholesale Deal Sniper Analyzer
oneLiner: Go/no-go on a time-sensitive deal after cost of speed.
pain: Helps decide if the deal margin covers instant-capital cost.
logic: Fee = Deal Cost * 0.02; Net ROI = (Profit - Fee) / Deal Cost; If Net ROI > 10% => SNIPE IT.

name: Unbankable Fundability Quiz
oneLiner: Quick pre-qual based on sales data, not personal credit.
pain: Reduces fear of rejection and routes qualified leads.

inputs.label: Do you have inventory to sell?

logic: If Revenue > $3k and Platform is Amazon/Shopify => APPROVED; shows Bank Rejected vs OnRamp Qualified.

name: Q4 Load Up Capacity Calculator
oneLiner: Estimate buying power before peak season with faster cycles.
pain: Shows how velocity funding increases inventory control before Dec 25.
logic: Simulates multiple buy/ship/fund cycles in a Q4 window vs one static batch.

name: Deferred Transaction Unlocker
oneLiner: Estimate how much deferred balance you can access today.
pain: Targets deferred transactions balance and shows immediate unlock potential.
logic: Unlockable Amount = Balance * 0.80 (conservative).

name: Zombie Inventory Detector
oneLiner: Flag aged inventory and decide whether to liquidate or hold.
pain: Helps evaluate aged inventory vs moving capital into fast movers.
logic: Compares holding cost vs liquidating and reallocating capital (includes opportunity cost concept).

name: Payroll Panic Countdown Timer
oneLiner: Know your cash-out date before payroll hits.
pain: Contractors need to know if theyll hit zero before expected payment.
logic: Labor Burden = Payroll*1.18; Daily Burn = Labor Burden/5; Days Until Zero = Balance/Daily Burn; if DaysUntilZero < days-to-payment => critical failure.

name: Bid Protector Inflation Adjuster
oneLiner: Add an inflation buffer so materials dont eat your margin.
pain: Bids starting months later get wrecked by material inflation.
logic: Risk Buffer = Material Cost * (Inflation Factor * Duration). Inflation factor pulled from static trend assumptions.

name: Net-90 Opportunity Cost Calculator
oneLiner: Show the real cost of waiting 90 days to get paid.
pain: Owners underestimate what slow pay costs in missed jobs.
logic: Opportunity Cost = Jobs * AvgProfit; Cost of Waiting = OpportunityCost / InvoiceAmount (annualized concept in doc).

name: Repair vs Replace ROI Engine
oneLiner: Compare the true year-1 cost of repairing vs replacing your truck.
pain: Trucker owners need a cold, fast decision under pressure.
logic: Repair Path = Repair + (DailyRevenue*Downtime); Replace Path = (Replacement-TradeIn) + (DailyRevenue*Downtime); Difference = Replace - Repair.

name: Spot Market Breakeven Calculator
oneLiner: Know the minimum $/mile you need to not lose money.
pain: Rates fluctuate; you need a hard floor before you accept a load.
logic: Fixed CPM = FixedCosts/Miles; Variable CPM = (FuelPrice/MPG)+MaintenanceCPM; Target Rate = FixedCPM + VariableCPM + (DesiredProfit/Miles).

name: Deal Killer Hard Money Analyzer
oneLiner: Green-light or kill a flip deal based on true carrying cost.
pain: Real estate investors need instant clarity on profit after hard money cost.
artifact: Green Light / Red Light Deal Scorecard
logic: Loan = Purchase+Rehab; Interest = Loan*0.12*(Hold/12); Total = Loan+Interest+Closing(3%); Profit = ARV-Total; Green if Profit > 15% of ARV.
ctaLabel: Get a Proof of Funds letter

name: Am I Bankable? Probability Score
oneLiner: Estimate funding probability before taking a hard pull.
pain: Owners fear rejection; this gives odds + routing.
logic: Score 0100 with points for revenue, credit, time, and low-risk industry.

name: Section 179 Tax Slash Calculator
oneLiner: Show net equipment cost after estimated tax savings.
pain: Owners hesitate on equipment; this shows real net cost after tax impact.
logic: Tax Savings = Equipment Cost * Tax Bracket; Net Cost = Equipment Cost - Tax Savings.

name: Burn Rate Runway Extender
oneLiner: Find your runway (months) before you hit zero.
pain: Startups need to know their death date and act early.
logic: Net Burn = Expenses - Revenue; Months Left = Cash / Net Burn.

name: Bad Debt Consolidator
oneLiner: Estimate monthly savings by consolidating multiple MCAs.
pain: Daily payments crush cash flow; consolidation can restore oxygen.
logic: Current Monthly Cost = DailyPayments*22; New Monthly Cost = (Balance*1.25)/Months; Savings = Current - New.
